text: Heavy rain caused flooding in Ecuador and Peru from December 2016 to May 2017. It killed 113 people and left 18 people missing. Many roads were destroyed. Dramatic rescues went online, including a woman being rescued from a mudslide and another showing a mudslide hitting a village. == References == Category:2016 disasters Category:2017 disasters Category:2010s floods 2016-2017 floods Category:21st century in Peru 2016-2017 floods Floods
